MS MCQs

    Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure

    »

    1. What are three correct options for deploying SAP products in Azure?

      Azure VMs, SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances), and SAP Cloud Appliance Library (CAL)

      Azure Service Fabric, Azure Container Service, Azure VMs.

      SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances), SAP Cloud Appliance Library (CAL), and Azure Container Instances.


    2. The which of the following SAP HANA products are supported on Azure VMs and SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances)?

      SAP Marketing Cloud and SAP S/4 HANA.

      SAP Portfolio and Project Management and SAP Engineering Control Center.

      SAP S/4 HANA and SAP BW/4 HANA.
